page_content:
THE ANDERSONS, INC. SUSTAINABILITY REVIEW14
SUPPORT OUR 
COMMUNITIES
We believe we should 
generously share 
our time, talents and 
financial resources in 
support of worthwhile 
community endeavors. In 
addition, we encourage 
others to do the same 
so that collectively, we 
can improve and sustain 
the quality of life in our 
communities. We are 
proud of the support 
that our employees give 
to their communities, 
both as part of the 
Company and in their 
personal lives.
Habitat for Humanity Playhouse Build
